markdownRemark.html:
Christmas is coming and I look forward to it. Not as much as my daughter, who start christmas chopping every January but this time, christmas will be different since I'm going to be in my hometown Gävle.

I'm going to visit family and friends and hope for a lot of snow and nice weather. You may have notice that this site uses a lot of christmas related pictures? I found an image service with free images at https://unsplash.com/ and it was very easy to configure APIs and set up a theme for pictures in my Gatsby site. :-)

Next week, I will continue trying to networking, finding a new job, and of course write som articles about Software Development.
